#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define p(n) printf("%d\n",n)

#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define N 300011
#define LN 21
using namespace std;

int m,n;
int k;
int cst;
ll a[1000002];
ll b[1000002];
int calc(int lo,int hi){
  int ans = lo + (hi-lo)/2;
  return ans;
}

int main()
{
   int i,j,t,q,k;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--){
        s(n);

        for(i=0;i<n;++i)
            sl(a[i]);
        sort(a,a+n);
        b[0] = a[0];
        for(i=1;i<=n-1;++i)
            b[i] = b[i-1] + a[i];

        ll ans = 1e17;
        for(i=0;i<=n-2;++i){
            ll ans1 ;
            ll ans2 ;
            int fin = calc(0,i);
            ans1 = (fin+1)*(a[fin])-b[fin]+(b[i]-b[fin])-(i-fin)*a[fin];
            fin = calc(i+1,n-1);
            ans2 = (fin-i)*(a[fin])-(b[fin]-b[i])+(b[n-1]-b[fin])-(n-1-fin)*a[fin];
            ans = min(ans,ans1+ans2);
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
   }


return 0;
}
